mapper.select: select id,pid as pId,simplename as name, ( CASE WHEN (pId = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as isOpen from sys_dept

select * from sys_dept
where simplename like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or fullname like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
order by num ASC
select dept_id menuId from sys_role_dept where role_id = #{roleId}
